attributes.action: stop Gordon Brown inheriting control of Britain, and call a General Election immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown will inherit leadership of the country within a week, without any public approval. We voted for Tony Blair and he has left - why is the leadership of the country being "handed down" to Brown with such disregard? We are supposed to live in a democracy, leaders are meant to be voted for by the people.

He will refuse to call an election himself because he knows, as does the rest of the country, that he cannot win an election. Therefore I urgently call upon the Prime Minister to call a general election immediately to stop this absolute reversal of democracy from happening.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NotBrown/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
